QxtSqlPackageModel Class Reference
[QxtSql module]

provides a read-only data model for QxtSqlPackage result.. More... 

 #include <QxtSqlPackageModel>

Inherits QAbstractTableModel.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • void setQuery ( QxtSqlPackage a )

Detailed Description

example usage:

QSqlQuery q;
q.exec("SELECT *");

QxtSqlPackage p;
p.insert(q);

QxtSqlPackageModel m;
m.setQuery(p);

QTableView v;
v.setModel(&m);
v.show();

Member Documentation

void setQuery ( QxtSqlPackage a )

set the data for the model.

Warning: do this before any access.
